to the current culture of government bailouts for corporations. When confronted with the news that the Big Three automakers will go under without government assistance, few can respond better than Indiana congressman Mike Pence : Economic freedom means the freedom to succeed and the freedom to fail. Is it possible to critique the idea of the corporation while still advocating capitalism? While rarely happening, yes, in fact it is. And Douglas Rushkoff shows us how in his fascinating new book.
